meanings.sent1: The zookeeper was unleashing the birds into the sky.
meanings.sent2: She was unleashing her creativity through painting.
meanings.sent3: The magician was unleashing a flurry of colorful scarves from his hat.
meanings.sent4: The storm was like nature unleashing its fury upon the land.
meanings.sent5: With a loud roar, the dragon was unleashing its fiery breath.

meanings.definition: To cause something powerful or violent to happen
meanings.sent1: The explosion was like unleashing chaos in the city.
meanings.sent2: The villain was unleashing his evil plan on the unsuspecting town.
meanings.sent3: The kids were unleashing their energy on the playground.
meanings.sent4: The volcano was unleashing its molten lava in a spectacular display.
meanings.sent5: The boxer was unleashing a series of powerful punches on his opponent.

meanings.definition: To bring out or reveal something hidden or suppressed
meanings.sent1: The therapy session was unleashing her repressed emotions.
meanings.sent2: The detective was unleashing the truth behind the mysterious case.
meanings.sent3: The comedian was unleashing laughter from the audience with his jokes.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise was like nature unleashing the beauty of the morning.
meanings.sent5: The artist was unleashing his inner thoughts through his abstract paintings.
